BotQ.text:
WHAT: Figure's new high-volume manufacturing facility for humanoid robots.

CATEGORY: Manufacturing facility.

FEATURES: Capable of manufacturing up to 12,000 humanoids per year.

CAPABILITIES: Vertically integrated manufacturing, building software infrastructure, robots building robots.

PRICING: Not specified.

STAGE: Alpha.

LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/botq

NOTE: Figure has made the decision to bring the manufacturing of humanoid robots in-house to control the build process, quality, and guarantee that they will deliver a high-functioning robot to market.
